name: White Tiles: Magic Piano Music
description:
Explore this thrilling and challenging top rated game !
Run your finger through the piano tiles and listen to the magic piano music you created.
◈ Funny & Challenging!
◈ Free offline game & Global rankings!
◈ Original version & Nostalgic version!
◈ Simply piano experience & Smaller package!

HOW TO PLAY
Watch your step, DO NOT TAP THE WHITE TILES! This is the core rule of this addictive game.
Sounds easy? Give it a try, and see how well you stack up against your friends.

FEATURES:
◈ White Tiles 1 Treasure Edition Initial version
◈ Charming piano soundtracks and piano music
◈ Customizable playlist
◈ More than 80 awesome game modes
◈ Muti-color themes & dozens of color options

TIPS:
1. Collect as many points as you can.
2. Don't tap the white tiles.
3. Share your best score with you friends.
4. For a simply piano music experience, headphones are recommended.

White Tiles : Magic Piano Game is a dreamy music piano game.
Download and have fun !!
Don‘t forget to rate us !!

We will keep updating, adding more songs and funny gameplay!

If you have any suggestions for the game, please contact ulesunstudio@gmail.com.
